content:
Suppose I slice CodeableConcept.coding by system. I've created some profiles on Coding with fixed systems - for SNOMED, LOINC, and a few internal systems. I'd like use them by reference, especially the internal ones.

Can I use my LOINC profile (that fixes system to http://loinc.org) to satisfy the slicing in my CodeableConcept profile?
I don't think we set anything like this up
Getting ready to deploy a whole set of enterprise standards and really want abstraction to work...
Do you evaluate the profile prior to the slicing?
The snapshot on the Coding would have the fixed if it was evaluated...
